scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-sources & npm run deploy-targets & npm run deploy-users
scripts.deploy-sources: gcloud functions deploy data-gateway-sources-poc --trigger-http --entry-point sourcesEntry --runtime nodejs8 --memory 256MB --timeout 10s
scripts.deploy-targets: gcloud functions deploy data-gateway-targets-poc --trigger-http --entry-point targetsEntry --runtime nodejs8 --memory 256MB --timeout 10s
scripts.deploy-users: gcloud functions deploy data-gateway-users-poc --trigger-http --entry-point usersEntry --runtime nodejs8 --memory 256MB --timeout 10s
